TextView.android:text: How should I start learning computer programming ?

1 - Firstly ask yourself, why do you want to learn programming. If the answer is just to earn money and get a job then try something else because you might become a programmer but not a GOOD PROGRAMMER.

2 - If you think that you actually love to work with computers then go for it. You should start with learning the basic programming language so that you can get easy with the programming concepts. I would recommend to go for C programming.

3 - Once you get with the basics of programming then you can try new and more advance high level languages which are used nowadays. Try to explore Java, python, Scala, Perl, ruby are some of the examples.

While learning the programming don't just stay with programming languages. Get yourself some knowledge of scripting languages for web development. Also try languages for databases. Who knows what you might like to work with.
